titles.title: A bill to extend the time required for construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Idaho, and for other purposes.
A bill to extend the time required for construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Idaho, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 109-460.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici with an amendment. With written report No. 109-304. Minority views filed.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 547.

bill.summary: Instructs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC), upon licensee request, to: (1) extend the period for commencing construction of project works for FERC project number 4656 (Arrowrock Hydroelectric Project, Idaho) for a period of three years, if the project license is in effect on the date of the enactment of this Act; or (2) reinstate the license, if it has been terminated already, and extend for an additional three years the period for commencing such construction.
